post.body:
Hello, just testing Zeronet out!
If you have any tips for me (e.g. privacy / anonymity or some cool sites) you can send me a zeromail or send me a message through bitmessage:

BM-2cVkB2QS8j5LDjQTwPCYCc57YtXgMB8yaM

Does anybody know why uploading something on ZeroUp in Tor-Always-Mode doesn't work? It instantly finishes the upload with 0kb uploaded with a speed of NaN

I don't want to use ZeroNet without Tor lol

http://3kj5vgdhdhdhzk3wmckhvgutswginiows7vcbhvzabergigiyfhdr6id.onion

Soon..

*NOTE:* This website will not run 24/7 and will be very simple considering the hardware it is running on..
Decided to update it every week or so while stacking up on *data* throughout the week.
Is it actually normal that ZeroNet freezes or has really bad performance whenever you load up a new zite or for example download a new file on ZeroUp? Just wondering

The size of the archive increased to more than double...

One day I'll just find duplicates and then that'd be it with the "project". It's a stupid idea anyway.

Recently had 2 grams of shrooms..
This shit is really awesome, you gotta try it out lol

Though I can only recommend to get it from a trusted source and please take it somewhere where you can relax and have people around you that you can trust (i.e. no parties or something like that, rather somewhere outside in the woods with at least one friend that isn't taking them)

The visuals are awesome and you will feel like in a different surreal world (of course only if you felt comfortable before taking in the shrooms)

comment.body:
@SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: Nice dude, thank you

Although tor mode seems to have some issues with connecting to trackers, it's constantly on 0/17 trackers

@leftside: weird, at least I'm not doing anything wrong in particular

Maybe it's because of the Tor browser (I mean you can't even upload profile pictures on ZeroMe through the Tor browser) but the problem is that the moment I use my regular browser I leak my real IP
Went online for the first time today. Expect slow connection and random downtime from time to time.
If I find even more I'll have to split the archive into multiple files... Maybe something like "editions"?... Or actually splitting the .tar.gz into parts?

@Cunny: currently 300mb

I know, it sounds small but considering the speed at which you can download files through Tor it's kinda big.
I recommend for example "fungee" on Empire Market, pretty good prices and seems relatively trustable
